title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.13 - Prohibited use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.13 - Prohibited use

State Regulations

No person shall knowingly use, or suffer or permit to be
used, an amusement device, temporary structure, viewing stand or tent, which is
not properly assembled or which is defective or unsafe in any of its parts, components, controls or safety equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-1.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
